text: Padmanabha Balakrishna Acharya (8 October 1931 â€“ 10 November 2023) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Nagaland from 2014 to 2019. In 2019, he was Governors of Manipur. In 2017, he was Governor of Arunachal Pradesh. From 2014 to 2015, he was Governor of Tripura. From 2014 to 2016, he was Governor of Assam. Acharya died at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Governors of Manipur Category:Governors of Nagaland Category:Governors of Arunachal Pradesh Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Tripura
title: Padmanabha Acharya
